critters

Class CritterBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • critters.CritterBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    NormalCritter

    public abstract class CritterBase
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract class that is the super-type of all types of objects produced by the CritterFactory.
    Version:
    1.1.5
    Author:
    Yichen LI
